con:mockService.name: CQZ_TEST_00001000 MockService

con:response.name: Response 1
con:response.con:script: // create XmlHolder for request content def holder = new com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder( mockRequest.requestContent ) // get argument def arg1 = holder["//Reservationid"] def arg2 = holder["//Personfirstname"] def arg3 = holder["//Personlastname"] def arg4 = holder["//Reservationreferenceid"] context.sessionid=Math.random() context.reservationid=arg1 context.personfirstname=arg2 context.personlastname=arg3 context.reservationreferenceid=arg4
con:response.con:responseContent:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:sap-com:document:sap:soap:functions:mc-style">
   <soapenv:Body>
      <urn:_-bic_-cqzTest00001000Response>
      	SessionID> = ${sessionid}
      	Reservationid = ${reservationid}
      	Reservationreferenceid = ${reservationreferenceid}
      	Personfirstname = ${personfirstname}
      	Personlastname = ${personlastname}
      </urn:_-bic_-cqzTest00001000Response>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
